channel.title: Drew's Private Feed: The Gino Lombardo Show
channel.description:
Drew's Private Feed: Live from 106.9 WLIR in Patchogue, Long Island, it’s the Gino Lombardo Show! No longer just a Comedy Bang Bang intern, Gino has been given his own morning show by Nassau Community College as his senior thesis project, and he’s taking full advantage with prank phone calls, field trips, and interviews with local Long Island celebrities. Sound speeds! (Now also available as a “podcast,” whatever that is.)
This feed was generated by Drew for private use.
channel.itunes:author: Stitcher Premium
channel.itunes:summary:
Live from 106.9 WLIR in Patchogue, Long Island, it’s the Gino Lombardo Show! No longer just a Comedy Bang Bang intern, Gino has been given his own morning show by Nassau Community College as his senior thesis project, and he’s taking full advantage with prank phone calls, field trips, and interviews with local Long Island celebrities. Sound speeds! (Now also available as a “podcast,” whatever that is.)
This feed was generated by Drew for private use.

item.title: Phantom Of The Menace
item.description: Gino finally gets to talk to some interesting people. Thanks to Jason Mantzoukas, Lily Sullivan, Carl Tart, Will Hines and Scott Aukerman.

item.title: Parasocial Activity
item.description: He's avoided it all season, but this week Gino is finally taking your calls! The phone lines are open as he's hearing out suggestions for his new creative direction. Will Gino get into cryptocurrency? Start a music festival? Or will he fall under the sway of another mysterious prankster? Thanks to Ben Rodgers.

item.title: Burst Of The First
item.description: Gino is alone in the woods of Heckscher State Park with an assortment of substances, determined to find his purpose.

item.title: Mango Yogurt Day
item.description: This week Gino Lombardo is opening up the vault, with three never-before-heard WLIR pilots Gino has tried hosting or producing. Call the Stitcher Premium hotline to vote for your favorite! Thanks to Will Hines and Ryan Stanger.

item.title: Blue Haterade
item.description: Gino’s pulling double duty this week - he’s back on the air at WLIR, but he’s also DJing a gig for his buddy Robert DiGiovanni. Will Madison’s bas mitzvah go off without a hitch? Only if Todd comes to the rescue. Thanks to Sarah Squirm and Lauren Lapkus.

item.title: Galileo Of The Pussy
item.description: After Gino broadcast from a pirate radio station last week, he's off the air this week; instead WLIR is releasing an episode of their top-rated morning sports show Frank & The Fat Dog. They're taking your calls on the Knicks, the Giants and the Hewlett High School game, plus callers like Ronnie from Ronkonkoma and fan favorite segments like Stanganelli's Gym Report! Thanks to Edgar Momplaisir, Joe Spellman, David Futernick, Ryan Stanger, Mano Agapion and Lisa Gilroy.

item.title: Screech Of The Dodo
item.description: Gino is back on the air! But he's done selling out to The Man; now he's on underground radio station 109.9 The 99, teaching his engineering skills to a new generation, and calling on an old friend to get his radio mojo back. Thanks to Mano Agapion, Lisa Gilroy, Ryan Stanger, Sam Kieffer and Jordan Duffy.

item.title: Stay Connected
item.description: In this episode, Gino presents "Disconnected," the secret documentary he's been working on for the past year. Thanks to Jessica McKenna, Ben Rodgers and Mary Holland.

item.title: Finding Gino Lombardo
item.description: In December of 2020, an unprecedented and confusing riot engulfed New York's Long Island. The man widely considered responsible, a local radio host named Gino Lombardo, went missing soon afterwards, fleeing the trail of devastation left in his wake. Where is Gino Lombardo? And how do his friends and loved ones feel about the man behind the chaos? WLIR and Margeaux Hazel-Beauregard bring you Finding Gino Lombardo, a Hulu Radio production. Thanks to Jessica McKenna, Mano Agapion, Lisa Gilroy, Betsy Sodaro and Don Fanelli.

item.title: Prank Clocks
item.description: It's a Gino Lombardo clip show! Gino couldn't make it to the Season 3 premiere of his show, so we've collected some of Gino's best moments, including highlights from his Comedy Bang Bang internship and some classic ads. Don't worry, there's lots of never before heard material too, including a long-lost childhood interview with Gino's uncle Dino, and of course bloopers! Please contact WLIR if you know where Gino is. Thanks to Scott Aukerman, Jason Mantzoukas, Paul F. Tompkins, Nick Kroll, Lauren Lapkus, John Gemberling, Matt Braunger, Matt Besser, Drew Tarver, Carl Tart, Edgar Momplasir, Ryan Stanger, Ben Rodgers, and Alison Rich.

item.title: Coming Soon: Season 3
item.description: The Gino Lombardo Show Season 3 is happening...with or without Gino. Listen on Stitcher Premium starting Monday October 11th!

item.title: Two Rats With Human Teeth
item.description: It's just another normal episode of The Gino Lombardo Show, as Gino catches up with his mentor Scott Aukerman, who helps him make an important decision. Thanks to Scott Aukerman, Betsy Sodaro, Drew Tarver and Carl Tart.

item.title: Pearl Note
item.description: After a brief false start, Gino interviews former FBI Director and Showtime star James Comey about his favorite fruits. Everything else is normal. Thanks to Drew Tarver, Carl Tart, Dan Lippert, Matt Rogers, Eliot Glazer, Betsy Sodaro and Ben Rodgers. This episode was brought to you by Patriot Supplements.

item.title: Turkey Leg
item.description: Gino starts working on a hilarious new prank while talking about his favorite movies, then takes Brett and Josh on a field piece to get knighted by the Knights Of Columbus. Thanks to Ify Nwadiwe, Dan Lippert, Sean Clements and Hayes Davenport. This episode was brought to you by Patriot Supplements: stay tuned for the Gino Wrap Up Show!

item.title: Fat Head
item.description: Gino announces he's joining a stand-up tour full of heavy hitters, before pitching comedy luminary Jude Aptitude on a new biopic, "The King Of Long Island." Don't worry though, he hasn't gotten too big to take a few calls from his adoring fans. Thanks to Alison Rich, Edgar Momplaisir, Ben Rodgers, Sean Clements & Hayes Davenport. This episode has been brought to you by Patriot Supplements - use the promo code GINO at checkout for 30% off AR-15 Bump Stock Arm Fuel.

item.title: Tiny Toilet
item.description: Gino's Q rating is blowing up, and he's taking advantage with a big new sponsorship deal! He also interviews his first non-human guest, Elbini the gremlin, and talks to his buddies Crif Perino and Carmine Barone, new owners of the Fledgling Rosebud off the 110. Thanks to Alison Rich, Sarah Squirm, Ben Rodgers, Ify Nwadiwe, Matt Rogers and Eliot Glazer.

item.title: UNDECIDED BOATERS
item.description: It's election week, and a big week for Gino as he interviews two of his favorite actors, Rocco Fettuccine and Tony Tarico from the upcoming film The Saloon Is Burning! Also the former White House Communications Director is here. Thanks to Anthony Scaramucci, Dan Lippert, Laci Mosley, Joey Clift and John Timothy.

item.title: Buy The Ticket, Take The Ride
item.description: It's the spooky season once again, and Gino is taking your Halloween calls and questions! He also summons Theresa Caputo, the Long Island Medium, who gives him some alarming news about the WLIR studios. But first, Gino chats with bas mitzvah party planner Robert DiGiovanni, and wonders whether he's ready to convert to Judaism. Thanks to Sarah Squirm, John Timothy, Joey Clift and Ben Rodgers.

item.title: American Lobster
item.description: This week Gino reunites with two of his favorite Season 1 guests! Long Island animal expert Mikey Lieberman is back on the show, along with more of his favorite animals. Later, we've got the Piano Man himself, Billy Joel returning for another deeply personal interview. Thanks to Laci Mosley, Gil Ozeri, John Gemberling and Ify Nwadiwe.

item.title: Floppy Disk
item.description: This week Gino is taking you back to school! He's strolling down memory lane with two of his favorite teachers, radio professor and free speech advocate Percy Clancy, and high school computer teacher Norman Friedmark. Later, he answers the WLIR listeners' school-related questions, and some of them are normal! Thanks to Gil Ozeri, John Gemberling, Edgar Momplaisir, Matt Rogers, Eliot Glazer, and Ben Rodgers.

item.title: Mouse Blouse
item.description: After the tumultuous events of last season, Gino is back on the WLIR airwaves! And so is his trainer Ryan Stanganelli, who's helping Gino get camera ready with a new Cobra Kai-inspired workout routine. Gino also catches up with his high school girlfriend and prom date Tina Riley, star of TNT's The Turtlist. Thanks to John Gemberling, Ryan Stanger and Laci Mosley.

item.title: Coming Soon: Season 2
item.description: Get ready for Season 2 of The Gino Lombardo show, premiering October 5th on Stitcher Premium!

item.title: Nursing Student Eye
item.description: It's Christmas in Long Island, and Gino is celebrating by buying his family some high-flush toilets. He plays a beautiful holiday tune from the Long Island Men's Choir, visits the FCC headquarters in Washington DC to stop his show from getting cancelled, and absolutely nothing else will go wrong. Thanks to Ben Rodgers, Mary Holland, and all of you for listening to the first season!

item.title: From Heathcliff To Mungo
item.description: Gino's Boston rival Mikey Beefcheeks has been roasting him mercilessly for his botched Billy Joel interview, so Gino meets him in Connecticut to settle the beef once and for all. They debate whether Boston has the best pizza, or New York has the best clam chowder. Stick around as Gino learns about his past lives with the help of Dr. Denise Robinson, and escalates his prank war with Don Donovan. Thanks to Mike Mitchell, Edgar Momplaisir, Alison Rich, Mary Holland and Ben Rodgers.

item.title: TikTok Dick Dock
item.description: Gino is live from the WLIR tent at the Splish Splash water park in Riverhead! He runs into Scott Aukerman's nephew Todd, who shows him some impressive Mento tricks. Gino's friend Bruce the lifeguard is here too, talking about his most famous wrongful death lawsuits. And word is Billy Joel is hanging out somewhere near the lazy river... Thanks to Lauren Lapkus, Dan Black, Alison Rich and Mary Holland.

item.title: Mouth Dryers
item.description: Gino considers getting a new car that will be safe from street fighters, before inviting wrestler Salvatore "Lionman" Domingo on to promote his charity screening of Chyna's sex tape. Stick around as Gino plays a listener-submitted prank call and asks his hairdresser Veronica Victoria Vita Vantolione why more haircuts don't include 'happy beginnings'. Thanks to Don Fanelli, Dan Black, Lauren Lapkus, Ben Rodgers and Alison Rich.

item.title: This Is Your Brain On Sauce
item.description: It’s Thanksgiving week, and Gino’s family crashes the show to talk about their favorite PornHub search terms and break some shocking news. Later, Gino gives callers Thanksgiving advice and plays an exciting voicemail he got from a celebrity fan. Thanks to Betsy Sodaro, Drew Tarver, Carl Tart, Dan Black & Ben Rodgers.

item.title: Affogato
item.description: This week Gino talks to two members of Long Island's "gay mafia" who helped him discover his own sexuality, Chris "Crif" Perino and Carmine Barone. They discuss why a vagina is like the Apple Store and how to pee with a boner. Stick around as Gino answers all your gym and workout questions! Thanks to Ben Rodgers, Lauren Lapkus, Matt Rogers & Eliot Glazer.

item.title: Stove Chaser
item.description: It's a big day for Gino as he interviews his mentor and radio professor Dr. Percy Clancy! You'll learn all about the good old days of radio and what happened to Percy's first wife. Then stick around for the second half as Gino talks to "the Jack Hanna of the tri-state area," Mikey Lieberman, and has some thrilling animal encounters. Thanks to Ben Rodgers, Edgar Momplaisir, Ryan Stanger and Gil Ozeri.

item.title: Always Wrap It Up
item.description: This week Gino allows his former boss and current intern Scott Aukerman to get on mic! They discuss what it's like to interview interesting people, before helping callers with their relationship problems. Stick around as Gino attempts to contact the ghost of Eddie Money with help from a special guest. Thanks to Drew Tarver, Scott Aukerman, Betsy Sodaro and Ben Rodgers.

item.title: No Glove, No Love
item.description: It's Halloween week! Gino catches up with one of his personal heroes, before interviewing Sal Scallopini from Vito's (not Vito from Sal's.) Later, Gino solves all of his callers' Halloween-based problems. Thanks to Ben Rodgers, Don Fanelli, Edgar Momplaisir, Betsy Sodaro, Drew Tarver, and Carl Tart.

item.title: Gym Cupid
item.description: Gino kicks off his very own show on WLIR with some Long Island News. Then Gino's personal trainer Ryan Stanganelli stops by to discuss his intensive weight-gain program. Stay tuned for a huge guest at the end of the hour! Thanks to Ben Rodgers, Ryan Stanger, Carl Tart and Gil Ozeri.

item.title: Coming Soon: The Gino Lombardo Show
item.description: Tune in to The Gino Lombardo Show, coming to Stitcher Premium Monday October 21st with new episodes every Monday!
